tool.name: Extract Repeat Library from RepeatExplorer Archive

param.name: min_coverage
param.label: minimal read depth coverage of contigs
param.help: region with lower coverage are trimmed off or hardmasked

data.name: contigs
data.label: Contigs(Repeat library) extracted from RepeatExplorer archive ${re_archive.hid}

tool.help: This tool extracts contigs and TAREAN concesus from RepeatExplorer archive in fasta format. Sequences with reads depth smaller that threshold are removed. Contigs shorter that specied threshold ere also filtered out. Filtering does not affect TAREAN consensus. Extracted sequences have Id in format CLXContigY where X is cluster ID and Y is number of contig.
